extendedInfo.description: â Free Full Length Classic Western Movies! â Classic Westerns gives you access to over one hundred classic public domain western films with the best possible movie watching and streaming experience. It features some of the best silver screen western actors, actresses, and directors. For access to our complete movie library, please check out our flagship application Movie Vault. All movies in Classic Westerns are also found in the the full version. FEATURES â Stream over 100 movies over Wi-fi or 3G with nothing more to buy! â Save movies to your Queue to watch them later!! â True Cover Art and movie information fed directly from IMDB! â Browse movies by Genre or Search by Keyword, Actor Name, Title, Director, and more. â Automatic updates of movie listing without app upgrade. FEEDBACK We would love to hear your feedback on the app, so please tell us what features you would like to see added. Also, let us know if you have found great movies out in the wild that you think we should add to the collection. Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/flingsoftguys SUPPORT If you have questions or need help, then please visit us at http://www.flingsoft.com/. If you find any technical issues with the movie streams, then please mail us at support@flingsoft.com with the movie in question. MOVIE INFORMATION All movies contained within the Classic Westerns application are Public Domain works as classified under Creative Commons. More information can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/. If you have any questions or concerns related to the use of a particular film, then please contact us at support@flingsoft.com. We would be happy to help.
